From: " . (USAFLS)" < 
To: "-(USAFLS)" 
Subject: RE: Any word on Epstein? 
Date: Fri, 28 Mar 2008 18:39:41 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Yes. The doctor thinks my recovery is miraculous. I should be back in on Monday, but probably only for a half-day. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Fax 561 820-8777 
----Ori inal Message 
From: (USAFLS) 
Sent: Frida , March 28, 2008 2:39 PM 
To: . (USAFLS) 
Subject: Re: Any word on Epstein? 
Thanks. R u ok? 
--------- ---------- ---
Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld 
Original Messa e —
From: . (USAFLS) 
To: (USAFLS) 
Sent: Fri Mar 28 14:38:04 2008 
Subject: RE: Any word on Epstein? 
I heard you had knee surgery. Hope everything is okay. 
I explained to MI that our grand jury will not have a quorum on April 8th, so if we do not indict on April 1st we have to wait 
until the 15th. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Fax 561 820-8777 
From: (USAFLS) 
Sent: Frida March 28, 2008 10:25 AM 
To: (USAFLS) 
Subject: RE: Any word on Epstein? 
No but I'll see what I can find out. 
. (USAFLS) 
March 27, 2008 2:20 PM 
USAFLS); -
(USAFLS) 
Subject: Any word on Epstein? 
(USAFLS) 
Hi all —  I am finally home from the hospital. I was wondering whether you have heard anything. 
EFTA00013550

Thank you. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Fax 561 820-8777 
EFTA00013551
